item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – A/P Engage Switches/Paddles (L CMD, C CMD, R CMD)

note.para: All operative autopilots may be used during autoland operations.

numlitem.para: If autopilot engagement between 200' and 500' AGL is desired, ensure the AFDS is fully operational.
For autoland operations, select APP switch and observe all three autopilots engage automatically at 1,500 feet AGL.
Monitor Autoland Status Annunciators (ASA) for autoland status.
Downgrade aircraft category dispatch status to CAT 3a.

placard.para: Placard A/P Engage Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
Placard associated A/P system "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
